DOC.brief_summary: To compare serum ketone body ( i.e. , total ketone , β hydroxybutyrate , estimate acetoacetate ) level single dose administration caprylic triglyceride ( CT ) oil , AC-1202 , AC-1204 , Axona® .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation PK Caprylic Triglyceride Oil , AC-1202 , AC-1204 , Axona Ketone Body Production
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy , adult , male 1855 year age , inclusive , screen . 2 . Continuous nonsmoker use nicotine containing product least 3 month prior Day 1 Period 1 throughout study . 3 . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20.0 ≤ 30.0 kg/m2 screening . 4 . Medically healthy clinically significant medical history , physical examination , laboratory profile , vital sign ECGs , deem PI designee . At screen , subject must alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ) < upper limit normal triglyceride level must < 250 mg/dL . 5 . A nonvasectomized subject must agree use condom spermicide abstain sexual intercourse study . ( No restriction require vasectomized male provide vasectomy perform 4 month prior Day 1 Period 1 . A subject vasectomized le 4 month prior Day 1 Period 1 must follow restriction non vasectomized male ) . 6 . Understands study procedure inform consent form ( ICF ) , willing able comply protocol . 1 . Subject mentally legally incapacitated significant emotional problem time screen visit expect conduct study . 2 . History presence clinically significant medical psychiatric condition disease opinion PI designee . 3 . History illness , opinion PI designee , might confound result study pose additional risk subject participation study . 4 . History presence alcoholism drug abuse within past 2 year prior Day 1 Period 1 . 5 . History presence hypersensitivity idiosyncratic reaction study drug , related compound , milk , palm coconut oil , soy . 6 . History presence diverticular disease , ulcer , inflammatory bowel disease recurrent diarrhea gout . 7 . Positive urine drug alcohol result screen check . 8 . Positive result screen human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) . 9 . Seated blood pressure le 90/40 mmHg great 140/90 mmHg screening . 10 . Seated heart rate lower 40 bpm high 99 bpm screening . 11 . QTcF interval > 460 msec ECG finding deem abnormal clinical significance PI designee screening . 12 . Estimated creatinine clearance ≤80 mL/min screening . 13 . Unable refrain anticipates use drug , include prescription non prescription medication , herbal remedy , vitamin supplement begin 14 day prior Day 1 Period 1 throughout study . Acetaminophen ( 2 g per 24 hour period ) may permit study . 14 . Has diet incompatible study diet , opinion PI designee , within 28 day prior Day 1 Period 1 throughout study . 15 . Is lactose intolerant . 16 . Is unable complete meal prior Day 1 Period 1 . 17 . Subject consume grapefruit Seville oranges within 14 day prior Day 1 Period 1 . 18 . Donation blood significant blood loss within 56 day prior Day 1 Period 1 . 19 . Plasma donation within 7 day prior Day 1 Period 1 . 20 . Participation another clinical study within 28 day prior Day 1 Period 1 . The 28 day window derive date last blood collection dosing , whichever later , previous study Day 1 Period 1 current study .
